SEARCH
Package com.example.eventlotto.model

Class User

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventlotto.model.User
public class User extends Object
Represents an application user profile stored in Firestore. Includes contact details, role, notification preferences, and audit timestamps.

    • User

      public User(String deviceId, String fullName, String email, String phone)
      Creates a user with entrant defaults using the device ID as UID.
      Parameters:
      deviceId - Device identifier (also used as UID).
      fullName - User's full name.
      email - User email.
      phone - User phone.
